# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="06408-102">Prečice na tastaturi u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06408-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06408-103">U Outlook.com možete koristiti isti tasterskih prečica kao e-mail usluga ste navikli da rade sa, kao što su Gmail, Yahoo Mail ili Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06408-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06408-104">Idite na [postavke pristupačnosti](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06408-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="06408-105">**Postavke**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06408-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="06408-106">**Prikaz svih postavki programa Outlook** > **General** > **pristupačnosti**) i odaberite koje tasterske prečice da biste želeli da koristite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06408-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06408-107">Kompletnu listu tasterskih prečica, potražite [prečice na tastaturi za Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06408-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
